## Project Overview

Due to water scarcity and rising salinity, everyone faces water quality issues in daily life at home, schools, institutes, and offices.  
To address this, we implemented a real-time monitoring system using sensors to collect data, store it, and display it on our live dashboard.

[![Video Preview](https://img.youtube.com/vi/dQw4w9WgXcQ/0.jpg)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/179960882/518010024-eed132f5-cd59-4c80-aae6-5dedc02f04b6.mp4?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NjM5NzM4ODEsIm5iZiI6MTc2Mzk3MzU4MSwicGF0aCI6Ii8xNzk5NjA4ODIvNTE4MDEwMDI0LWVlZDEzMmY1LWNkNTktNGM4MC1hYWU2LTVkZWRjMDJmMDRiNi5tcDQ_)
